name: what-is-that
description: Minimal, tiny (1.1 kb) object type identifier for both Node.js and browser written in TypeScript.

scripts.build:rename:common: ls -d common/* | grep -v d.ts | sed -E 's/^([^\.]*)(.*$)/\1\2 \1.common\.compiled\2/' | xargs -IX echo mv X | sh && mv common/* .
scripts.build:rename:esm: ls -d esm/* | sed -E 's/^([^\.]*)(.*$)/\1\2 \1.esm\.compiled\2/' | xargs -IX echo mv X | sh && mv esm/* .
scripts.build:rename: npm run build:rename:common && npm run build:rename:esm
scripts.build:adjust:common: sed -i -e 's/index\.js\.map/index\.common\.compiled\.js\.map/' index.common.compiled.js && sed -i -e 's/index\.js/index\.common\.compiled\.js/' index.common.compiled.js.map && sed -i -e 's/\.\.\/index\.ts/\.\/index\.ts/' index.common.compiled.js.map && sed -i -e 's/\.\.\/index\.ts/\.\/index\.ts/' index.d.ts.map
scripts.build:adjust:esm: sed -i -e 's/index\.js\.map/index\.esm\.\compiled\.js\.map/' index.esm.compiled.js && sed -i -e 's/index\.js/index\.esm\.compiled\.js/' index.esm.compiled.js.map && sed -i -e 's/\.\.\/index\.ts/\.\/index\.ts/' index.esm.compiled.js.map
scripts.build:adjust: npm run build:adjust:common && npm run build:adjust:esm
scripts.build:minify: npm run build:minify:common && npm run build:minify:esm
scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run build:rename && npm run build:adjust && npm run build:minify
